definition.text: Remember the third requirement to earn your Tokens Bonus? "You must drive Token Power to the program". What's that all about?

paragraphs.text: We're probably getting in the weeds here, but I'll try to keep it simple!
When your Governance Address has some tokens in its balance, then you get the same amount of Token Power in your User Profile.

Token Power flows down the hierarchy like a river! The amount of Token Power you let into each Governance Program determines how strongly you wish to participate in the program and impacts the Token Rewards you may get from it.
By default, Token Power flows in equal amounts to all offspring nodes! You may change this though!
